name: To Live A Sea Shanty
description:
OBJECTIVE

You are a pirate at sea in the late 1600s!

As a daring captain, make smart choices and manage your resources with care, and complete tasks successfully to earn ✦10 gold✦ and retire!

✦★✦ At the end of your journey, listen to the personalized, choice-adapting sea shanty written in honour of your legacy! ✦★✦

CONTROLS

Mouse-click on buttons as appropriate

Read resource rules by mousing over resource icons

Read minigame tutorials as they appear for more information on controls
